items.title: Flood situation worsens in Perak, Penang, Kedah
items.summary: KUALA LUMPUR: Continuous heavy rain in the northern Peninsula has worsened flood conditions in Perak, Kedah and Penang, with the number of evacuees at relief centres rising to 4,743 tonight, compared to 4,252 this evening. Read full story

items.title: Get an expanded cleaning with this 1,900 PSI Greenworks electric pressure washer combo at $100 (Reg. $220, Today only)
items.summary:
As part of its Deals of the Day, Best Buy is offering the Greenworks 1,900 PSI Electric Pressure Washer Combo Kit for $99.99 shipped. You can only find a refurbished model directly from the brand’s website. You’d normally be shelling out $220 for this combo bundle at full price, which we’ve seen regularly dropping to $110 and $100 in these one-day-only sales, with some occasional drops to the $95 low. For the rest of the day, you can save $120 off the going rate at the second-lowest price we have tracked.

items.title: The full breakout session agenda at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: The full Disrupt 2025 breakout session agenda now live. Join for tactical, small-group learning on AI, fundraising, M&A, workflows, and more. Browse the full lineup and register today to save up to $444. and 60% off a second pass before prices rise on October 27.

items.title: Nigeria court adjourns separatist Kanu's terrorism trial to Monday
items.summary: ABUJA (Reuters) -A Nigerian court on Friday adjourned the terrorism trial of separatist leader Nnamdi Kanu until October 27, after he failed for a second day to open his defence, citing a lack of access to his case file following the dismissal of his legal team. Read full story

items.title: Automattic files counterclaims against WP Engine in WordPress lawsuit, alleging trademark misuse
items.summary: Automattic has filed counterclaims against WP Engine, alleging that the company — backed by private equity firm Silver Lake — misused WordPress and WooCommerce trademarks, misled users, and undermined the open source community.

items.title: Nigeria's Tinubu replaces service chiefs in major military shake-up
items.summary: LAGOS (Reuters) -Nigerian President Bola Tinubu has appointed new service chiefs in a sweeping overhaul of the country's military leadership, the presidency said on Friday, as part of efforts to strengthen national security. Read full story

items.title: US strikes another alleged drug boat in Caribbean
items.summary: Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth said the tenth strike in the region targeted the Tren de Aragua cartel.

items.title: North Korea's Kim, Trump have chance to meet next week, South's minister says
items.summary: SEOUL (Reuters) -South Korea's unification minister on Friday called on U.S. President Donald Trump to meet the leader of North Korea during his forthcoming visit to Asia, urging the two men to seize a rare chance for peace, Yonhap news agency reported. Read full story

items.title: Canada will restart trade talks when 'Americans are ready', says Carney
items.summary: The US president says he is axing negotiations over an advert that used Ronald Reagan speaking negatively about tariffs.

items.title: US strike against alleged drug vessel in Caribbean kills six, Pentagon says
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -A U.S. strike against an alleged drug vessel killed six suspected "narco-terrorists" in the Caribbean, U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said on Friday, the latest operation in President Donald Trump's counter-drug campaign in the region. Read full story

items.summary: The three-year-old lawsuit centered on Rivian's sudden decision to increase prices on the R1 lineup in 2022, which sank the stock price.

Wonder. But Nintendo isn’t done yet, as it just announced that Mario will be soaring the skies through the streets of NYC this Thanksgiving in the Macy’s Day Parade.

items.title: AI at the edge: How startups are powering the future of space at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: Just 3 days until lift-off for Disrupt 2025 — and the Space Stage is ready to explore the future of space tech (and every other frontier of innovation). Adam Maher (Ursa), Dr. Lucy Hoag (Violet Labs), and Dr. Debra L. Emmons (The Aerospace Corporation) will unpack how AI is transforming life in orbit. Register now to save up to $444 on your pass, and 60% on a second.

items.title: Almost 4,400 people abused by priests in Italy, victims' group alleges
items.summary: ROME (Reuters) -Nearly 4,400 people have been abused by Catholic priests in Italy in cases reported since 2020, a victims' group alleged on Friday, renewing pressure on bishops to confront a crisis that has long plagued the world's largest Christian faith. Read full story

items.summary:
LISEN MagSafe Car Mount

Buy for $7 (Reg. $17)

Enter promo code XZMTIC2T for $6.11 off.

What we love

This handy accessory lets you securely mount your phone on your car’s dashboard using strong 3M adhesive. It’s compatible with iPhone 12 and newer models, as well as recent Pixel phones with built-in magnets. The mount provides a dedicated spot for your device while you’re on the road, and it supports both horizontal and vertical orientations.

items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -Three separate controversies involving leaked text messages from private online group chats have rocked U.S. political circles this month, revealing racist, antisemitic and violent statements from figures across the ideological spectrum.  Read full story

items.title: Hey, you guys! LEGO uncovers new The Goonies set as the final Ideas addition of 2025
items.summary:
After some exciting new LEGO reveals this month, the LEGO Group is finally ripping the veil off a long-awaited Ideas set that we first got wind of over a year ago, right alongside the now-released Ideas Gremlins: Gizmo set that hit shelves at the top of the month. The new LEGO Ideas 21363 The Goonies set will mark the final build to join the theme in 2025, coming packed with blast-from-the-past details from one of the most beloved films of the 80s – and the best part is you won’t have to wait very long from today to get your hands on it! It’s going to be a massive set, worthy of taking center stage in your display, and we’ve collected all the details and photos for you below.

When Disrupt 2025 arrives, the city doesn’t just host innovation — it amplifies it, transforming San Francisco into a living showcase of ideas, products, and partnerships driving the next wave of tech. Register before prices hike in 3 days.

items.summary:
One of the more anticipated RPG launches of the fall game release season has to be The Outer Worlds 2 from Obsidian. The game is set for an official release next week on October 29 and if you’re looking at land a nice little bonus offer on your pre-order of the $99.99 premium edition, Newegg is throwing in a FREE $10 Xbox gift card right now. And the Premium Edition we are featuring here actually releases today at 1 p.m. ET (it includes 5-day early access). Having only released in May, this new model has been keeping to its $1,999 MSRP for the time since, with this early access sale giving us the very first cash savings on it. You’re not only getting a solid $200 markdown, but also one of the brand’s latest and most advanced e-mobility solutions, setting the bar for future discounts down the road.
